songs.title: Heavy
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Izzy B Productions
Ayy, man, turn me up, man
Got my nigga in this bitch but we smoking boof all day, nigga
Boofed up, nigga
Carti, nigga, uh, yo
Lean (Skrrt, skrrt, skrrt)
Playboi Carti (Skrrt), yeah
What up? Ayy, damn, oh, yeah

[Verse]
My iPhone white and my bitch too (Hello?)
It's 678, who the fuck is you? Uh
I'm all about my team, I'm all about this green
Serve a couple fiends, then we clear the scene, uh
Baby bottle lean, your lady off a bean (A bean)
She laying beside the G, she trying to let me squeeze, damn
True Religion jeans, my Vans say Supreme, uh
Her head game mean, just don't touch her weave, uh (No)
Fugazi ass niggas think they own shit, uh
I'm trying to tell these niggas, bitch, we been did it, uh (Yeah)
Finger fuck the cunt, ten racks a month (Goddamn, yeah)
Smoking on this blunt, I ain't stressing nothing (Goddamn, yeah)
If a opp pull me over, I'ma rob him up, uh (Ayy)
Or duct tape his mouth, shut that nigga up, yeah
They lying about the streets, ain't seen you on the block
Keep talking like you about it, we gon' have to mob (Mob, what?)
Leave you boys bloody, you gon' need a mop
She gone ride this dick 'cause she know what I'm about (Yeah, yeah)
I got a pint of lean, Xans by the ounce (Uh)
I keep this shit live, they say I run the South, damn
They want that old Carti, fuck that old Carti (Yeah)
Bitch, I glowed up, tell my mom that I'm sorry, damn
Bitch, I'm in the 'Rari (Goddamn), my lingo retarded (Goddamn)
She tweaking off a molly, man, come get your shawty, damn

[Pre-Chorus]
Xannies, Xannies leaning heavy
I can't stay steady
Kush coma, why you on that reggie?

[Chorus]
Xannies, Xannies
Bitch, I'm leaning heavy
Xannies, Xannies
Bitch I'm leaning heavy (Heavy)
Kush coma, kush coma, why you on that reggie? (Reggie)
Kush coma, kush coma, why you on that reggie? (Carti)
Xannies, Xannies
Bitch, I'm leaning heavy
Xannies, Xannies
Bitch, I'm leaning heavy (Playboi Carti)
Kush coma, kush coma, why you on that reggie? (Damn)
Kush coma, kush coma, why you on that reggie? (Goddamn)
Xannies, Xannies
Bitch, I'm leaning heavy (Goddamn)
Xannies, Xannies
Bitch, I'm leaning heavy (Goddamn)
Kush coma, kush coma, why you on that reggie? (Goddamn)
Kush coma, kush coma, why you on that reggie? (Carti)

[Outro]
Damn
Lean, Playboi Carti
Yeah, lean
Damn
Skrrt, skrrt-skrrt, skrrt-skrrt
Skrrt, Carti, yeah, ayy
